actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 62 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, to provide that amounts which the taxpayer pays as alimony or separate maintenance shall be deductible from his gross income in determining adjusted gross income.

summary.text: Provides, under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, that amounts which the taxpayer pays an alimony or separate maintenance shall be deductibe from his gross income in determing adjusted gross income. (Adds 26 U.S.C. 62 (10))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 62 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, to provide that amounts which the taxpayer pays as alimony or separate maintenance shall be deductible from his gross income in determining adjusted gross income.
